values: 在（某处）；在…里；在…上；在…旁；以…为目标；向；朝；由于；因为；在…期间；在…时刻；在…时间；在…岁时；处于…状态；处于…活动；以…的方式；通过；经由；忙于；从事；从事于；参加；出席；以（价格）；达（数值）；对…回应；根据；按照；从；在…方面；应；响应
（AT）气温（air temperature的缩写）；酸处理（Acid Treatment的缩写）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 表地点时，指空间位置上的某一点；表时间时，指在时间上的某一时刻。
表地点时，指某物与另一物表面相接触，或与某地方接壤等；表时间时，指在某一天或某一天的某个时间，尤指在星期几。
表地点时，指在某一立体空间范围内；表时间时，指一段时间或与年、月、季节时间连用。

word_group.brief_definition: 在结束的时候；在…的尽头
在…的底部；(是)基本力量；(是)…的真正原因
突然, 忽然；一起, 同时
在工作, 在干活, 在活动；在运转
瞄准；以...为目标；力求；旨在
近在手边；在近旁；即将到来；即将发生；可随时使用；可方便地得到

list.abstract: AT代表自动变速器(automatic transmission），又称自动档，是一种可以在车辆行驶过程中自动根据油门改变齿轮传动比的汽车变速器。 自动变速器由液力变扭器、行星齿轮变速器、控制机构组成。能根据路面状况自动变速变矩，驾驶者可以更好地注视路面交通而不会被换档搞得手忙脚乱。AT不用离合器换档，档位少变化大，连接平稳，因此操作容易，既给开车人带来方便，也给坐车人带来舒适，但对速度变化反应较慢，费油不经济，修理困难。

Aluminium titanate　A T
分子式：Al2TiO5
熔点：1860℃
用途：钛酸铝陶瓷是著名的热膨胀系数较低的材料，但其在高温煅烧时易裂，机械强度较差。此外，钛酸铝在约1000℃下加热，容易分解成氧化物，为此，通常加入各种添加剂，调整原料配比，及控制煅烧条件以改进上述缺点。成品用于满足耐热性及耐热冲击性能用途的要求。
备注：属斜方晶系拟板钛矿型结晶。平均热膨胀系数为9.5E-6/℃。
类别：无机盐

yingyinNormal.en: So you're not laughing at him. You're laughing at me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你们不是在笑他。你们是在笑我。

yingyinNormal.en: We're not at war, Captain. They are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不是在打仗，队长。他们在打。

yingyinNormal.en: Girl, you're good at this. You should work at Starbucks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你牛啊，美女，你就应该在星巴克干的。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey! Leonard, where are you? I'm at work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德，你在哪呢？我在工作。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you getting at, Sid?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在暗示什么?

yingyinNormal.en: This one time she was at...
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一次我们在...

yingyinNormal.en: At least we have each other.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至少我们还在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: You were at the coffeehouse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们本身就在咖啡馆里。

yingyinNormal.en: And those things at the clinic?
yingyinNormal.zh: 在诊所的那些是？

yingyinNormal.en: So why was he at your party?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那他怎么会出现在派对上？

yingyinNormal.en: Is Leonard around? He's upstairs at Alicia's.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱纳德在不在？他在楼上跟艾丽西娅一起。

yingyinNormal.en: You did. Tomorrow, at the beach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你干的，明天在海滩。

yingyinNormal.en: Were you out at the pile? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们刚才在抢险吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you know what hospital he's at?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道他在哪家医院吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, look at me! I'm flyin', by golly!
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿！看看我！我在飞！

yingyinNormal.en: What, $3500 at Porcelain Safari?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在“狩猎陶瓷”花了3500块钱？

yingyinNormal.en: You can't play bagpipes at the wedding.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不能在婚礼上吹风笛。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, Mummy, we're at the playground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，妈妈，我们在体育场了。

yingyinNormal.en: So, how was your day at school? Fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天在学校过得怎么样？挺好的。

yingyinNormal.en: 2 minutes. With the current at full power.
yingyinNormal.zh: 两分钟，在最佳情况下。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在工作；在干活；在活动；在运转
接近；临近；近在手边；在近旁
成败难料；得失都可能；有风险

examination_example.sentence: Do not sign your own name <highlight>at</highlight> the end.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不要在末尾签自己的名字。

examination_example.sentence: There're enough people to fill the jobs <highlight>at</highlight> McDonalds and other places where you don't need to have much skill.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
有足够的人来填补麦当劳和其他不
需要太多技能的地方的工作。

examination_example.sentence: What the study doesn't measure is whether people are still doing work when they're <highlight>at</highlight> home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项研究没有衡量的是人们在家时是否还在工作。

sense_info_list.en: used to say when something happens

examination_example.sentence: Before each of their revelations many thinkers <highlight>at</highlight> the time had sustained more ancient ways of thinking, including the geocentric view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在他们每次作出发现之前，当时的许多思想家都保持更古老的思维方式，包括地心说。

examination_example.sentence: Factors such as our social class will encourage us towards certain interpretations but <highlight>at</highlight> the same time obscure or even close off others.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
诸如我们的社会阶层等因素会鼓励
我们做出某些解释，但同时会模糊
甚至封闭其他解释。

examination_example.sentence: While it probably wasn't apparent <highlight>at</highlight> the time, much of this work is permeated by a spirit of romantic escapism.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
虽然这在当时可能并不明显，但这
部作品中的大部分内容都弥漫着一种浪漫的逃避主义精神。

examination_example.sentence: Mechanization isn't the answer, either – not yet, <highlight>at</highlight> least.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机械化也不是答案——至少目前还不是。

examination_example.sentence: The opposition claims primary school pupils doing <highlight>at</highlight> least two hours of sport a week have nearly halved.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
反对派声称，每周至少运动两个小
时的小学生几乎减少了一半。

examination_example.sentence: To accurately tell whether someone is sociable, studies show, we need <highlight>at</highlight> least a minute, preferably five.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
研究表明，要准确判断一个人是否
善于交际，我们至少需要一分钟，
最好是五分钟。

examination_example.sentence: Then the inevitable happens: You lose your patience and either scream <highlight>at</highlight> your kids or say something that was a bit too harsh.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后不可避免的事情发生了：你失去了耐心，要么对你的孩子尖叫，要么说一些过于严厉的话。

examination_example.sentence: In our contemporary culture, the prospect of communicating with — or even looking <highlight>at</highlight> — a stranger is virtually unbearable.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
在我们的当代文化中，与陌生人交
流甚至看着陌生人的可能性几乎是无法忍受的。

examination_example.sentence: That should create more collaborative endeavors and help to develop projects aimed directly <highlight>at</highlight> solving global problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将会激发更多的合作努力，并有助于开发直接旨在解决全球性问题的项目。

sense_info_list.en: denoting a particular point or segment on a scale

examination_example.sentence: "Then increase it <highlight>at</highlight> a higher rate each year and essentially try to generate additional revenue."
examination_example.sentence_trans:
“然后每年以更快的速度增长，本质
上是试图创造额外的收入。”

examination_example.sentence: For now it appears the economy is creating jobs <highlight>at</highlight> a decent pace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就目前而言，经济似乎正在以不错的速度创造就业机会。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>At</highlight> the state level their influence can be even more fearsome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在州一级，他们的影响甚至更可怕。

sense_info_list.en: expressing a particular state or condition

examination_example.sentence: Normal-weight people are in fact <highlight>at</highlight> higher risk of some diseases compared to those who are overweight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，与超重的人相比，体重正常的人患某些疾病的风险更高。

examination_example.sentence: This top-down conception of the fashion business couldn't be more out of date or <highlight>at</highlight> odds with the feverish world described in Overdressed.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
这种自上而下的时尚商业理念已经
非常老套，也与《过度着装》中描
述的狂热世界不一致。

examination_example.sentence: Most people do not realise that there are strong commercial agendas <highlight>at</highlight> work to keep them in passive consumption mode.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
大多数人没有意识到，有强大的商
业议程在起作用，从而使他们处于被动消费模式。

examination_example.sentence: Put simply, they're not really living <highlight>at</highlight> all.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
简而言之，他们根本就没有真正地
生活。

examination_example.sentence: Then, why do we trust <highlight>at</highlight> all?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么，我们到底为什么要信任呢?

examination_example.sentence: Children were not colour-coded <highlight>at</highlight> all until the early 20th century: in the era before domestic washing machines all babies wore white.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在20世纪初以前，孩子们是根本没有用颜色来标记的：在家用洗衣机之前的时代，所有的婴儿都穿白色衣服。

sense_info_list.en: expressing a relationship between an individual and a skill

examination_example.sentence: Every time we fail <highlight>at</highlight> something, we can choose to look for the lesson we're meant to learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
每当我们在某件事上失败时，我们
都可以选择寻找我们应该学习的教训。

examination_example.sentence: Young people who are digital natives are indeed becoming more skillful <highlight>at</highlight> separating fact from fiction in cyberspace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为数字原住民的年轻人确实越来越善于将网络空间中的事实与虚构区分开来。

examination_example.sentence: In short, these are the types of jobs that machines can perform much better <highlight>at</highlight> than human beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
简而言之，这些是机器比人类更擅
长的工作类型。

examination_example.sentence: But that doesn't mean crucial ethical issues involving AI aren't <highlight>at</highlight> hand.
examination_example.sentence_trans:
但这并不意味着涉及人工智能的关
键伦理问题没有近在咫尺。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>At</highlight> the demand of regular shoppers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在普通顾客的要求之下。

examination_example.sentence: Though plants lack brains, the firing of electrical signals in their stems and leaves nonetheless triggered responses that hinted <highlight>at</highlight> consciousness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然植物没有大脑，但它们的茎和叶发出的电信号仍然触发了暗示意识的反应。

examination_example.sentence: It is unlikely that Generation Z will be done with education <highlight>at</highlight> 18 or 21.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Z世代不太可能在18岁或21岁就完成教育。

sense_info_list.en: used to show the cause of something, especially a feeling
used to state the distance away from something

word_usage.usage:
at与形容词连用
①表示“因为；由于；对”
例：They were impatient at the delay. 他们对拖延不耐烦了。
②（表示状况）在…方面
例：I'm good at French. 我的法语很好。
at可以后接名词表示处在某种状态或“从事；正在做”，此时其后接的名词通常不用冠词，如：at work在工作、at war在交战。

at放在动词或动词短语的后面，常表示动作的目的或目标，表示“向、朝”，但表示目标时，at只表示动作本身，并不表示动作结果
例：He shot at the bird. 他向那只鸟射击。（是否射中并不知道）
       He shot the bird. 他射中了那只鸟。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 表示动作的目标和方向

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在结束的时候；在…的尽头
(是)基本力量；是由于他们引起的；在…的底部
瞄准；以...为目标；力求；旨在
近在手边；在近旁；即将到来；即将发生；可随时使用；可方便地得到
在街角；在拐角处；在墙角
惊讶于；对…感到惊奇；对…感到吃惊
处于交战状态；与...不和；与...有争执

examination_example.sentence: Are you attending the conference tomorrow morning <highlight>at</highlight> the Shelton Hotel?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你要参加明天早上在谢尔顿酒店举行的会议吗？

examination_example.sentence: She added that she had a line of staff <highlight>at</highlight> her door wanting to take the training.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她补充说，她门口有一排员工想参加培训。

examination_example.sentence: I would go to the office, sit <highlight>at</highlight> my desk and repeat the same work five days a week 9 to 5.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会去办公室，坐在办公桌前，每周五天，朝九晚五地重复同样的工作。

examination_example.sentence: Feeling my anger <highlight>at</highlight> my inability to manage this song gracefully, I accepted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我对自己无法优雅地演唱这首歌感到愤怒，只能无奈接受。

examination_example.sentence: We supported each other financially and by showing up <highlight>at</highlight> events.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们在经济上互相支持，并在重大活动中露面。

examination_example.sentence: Those were also <highlight>at</highlight> the core of our relationship off the screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些也是我们在银幕下关系的核心。

examination_example.sentence: In the wild, many cats hunt <highlight>at</highlight> night because their eyes are designed for low light.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在野外，许多猫科动物在夜间捕猎，因为它们的眼睛是专为光线较暗的情况而设计的。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't have to be big, but I can't stand noise <highlight>at</highlight> bedtime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 声音不一定很大，但我不能忍受睡觉时的噪音。

examination_example.sentence: Actually I'm going to meet with Professor Smith <highlight>at</highlight> ten past two.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，我两点十分要和史密斯教授见面。

examination_example.sentence: She looked back <highlight>at</highlight> him with fire in her eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她回望着他，眼里含着怒火。

examination_example.sentence: The last thing I saw was Don's face, looking calmly back <highlight>at</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我最后看到的是唐的脸，他平静地看着我。

examination_example.sentence: He was unconscious and as I looked <highlight>at</highlight> his face, something occurred to me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他失去了知觉，当我看着他的脸时，我想到了什么。

examination_example.sentence: With our study, we think we can now confidently conclude that <highlight>at</highlight> least some dogs can distinguish human facial expressions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过我们的研究，我们认为现在可以自信地得出结论，至少有一些狗可以区分人类的面部表情。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>At</highlight> least it seems that way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至少看起来是这样。

examination_example.sentence: But during the next week, set a goal of <highlight>at</highlight> least a mile and a half per run.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在接下来的一周，设定一个目标，每次至少跑1.5英里。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>At</highlight> last I ended up hitting the set with my fist, and it stopped working altogether.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，我用拳头打了一下电视，它完全停止工作了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>At</highlight> first, John spent his time hunting for fun.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初，约翰把时间花在寻找乐趣上。

sense_info_list.zh: 表示动作的目标和方向

exam_freq_info.chinese: (~least) 至少; 不少于; 起码
(~first) 一开始; 最初; 起初
(用于动词后, 涉及未做成或未做完的事)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在结束的时候；在…的尽头
在…的底部；(是)基本力量；(是)…的真正原因
在工作；在干活；在活动；在运转
近在手边；在近旁；即将到来；即将发生；可随时使用；可方便地得到
过度劳累；(起早贪黑而疲惫不堪)超负荷工作

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在街角；在拐角处；在墙角
在恰当的时间；在对的时间
一开始；在最开始的时候
吃惊；对...惊讶；对某事感到惊奇
在远处；有一段相当的距离；稍远些
在此阶段；在这个阶段；本阶段

examination_example.sentence: For example, packed foods usually are not sold <highlight>at</highlight> farmers’ markets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，包装食品通常不在农贸市场出售。

examination_example.sentence: A few days late the he met a neighbor <highlight>at</highlight> the store.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几天后，他在商店遇见了一个邻居。

examination_example.sentence: The development of artificial intelligence was a hot topic <highlight>at</highlight> the conference.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人工智能的发展在会上是一个热门话题。

examination_example.sentence: It’s reported that he passed away <highlight>at</highlight> the age of 91 yesterday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据报道，他于昨天去世，享年91岁。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>At</highlight> the age of seven.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 七岁的时候。

examination_example.sentence: The son got the train and railway set <highlight>at</highlight> the age of four.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 儿子在四岁时就有了火车和铁路。

examination_example.sentence: Why weren't you in the room <highlight>at</highlight> 10 o'clock this morning, Betty?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 贝蒂，今天早上10点你为什么不在房间里？

examination_example.sentence: Posted 16th April <highlight>at</highlight> 16:57.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 发布于4月16日16点57分。

examination_example.sentence: The garden sensor helps the environment and does yard work <highlight>at</highlight> the same time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 花园传感器有助于保护环境，同时还能做庭院工作。

examination_example.sentence: You will be amazed by the wonderful designs when you look <highlight>at</highlight> their paper-cutting works carefully.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你仔细观看他们的剪纸作品时，你会对这些精彩的设计感到惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: Look <highlight>at</highlight> the UFO.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 看那个不明飞行物。

examination_example.sentence: The giant looked <highlight>at</highlight> him and then put him into a large bag and carried him off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巨人看了看他，然后把他放进一个大袋子里带走了。

sense_info_list.zh: (~least) 至少; 不少于; 起码

examination_example.sentence: A large ship broke down in the river, leaving <highlight>at</highlight> least 100 big ships unable to pass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一艘大船在河中抛锚，导致至少100艘大船无法通过。

examination_example.sentence: Write <highlight>at</highlight> least 60 words on the given situation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据给定的情景，写至少60个词。

examination_example.sentence: All jazz lovers should come to the Montreal International Jazz Festival <highlight>at</highlight> least once in a lifetime.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有的爵士乐爱好者一生中至少应该来一次蒙特利尔国际爵士音乐节。

examination_example.sentence: was good <highlight>at</highlight> cleaning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在打扫卫生方面擅长。

examination_example.sentence: Every time you grow and fail and learn, you become better <highlight>at</highlight> finding out the way to success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每一次你成长、失败和学习，你都变得更善于找到成功之路。

examination_example.sentence: Bob is good <highlight>at</highlight> playing the violin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鲍勃擅长拉小提琴。

sense_info_list.zh: (~first) 一开始; 最初; 起初

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>At</highlight> first, Derek was running well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初，德里克跑得很好。

examination_example.sentence: I hesitated <highlight>at</highlight> first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初我犹豫了。

examination_example.sentence: First give solutions, then show problems, and list reasons, <highlight>at</highlight> last express ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先给出解决方案，然后展示问题，并列出原因，最后表达想法。

examination_example.sentence: The grapes could be sold <highlight>at</highlight> a better price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些葡萄可以卖个好价钱。

examination_example.sentence: Not <highlight>at</highlight> all.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一点也不。

sense_info_list.zh: (用于动词后, 涉及未做成或未做完的事)

examination_example.sentence: It was probably just the beginning of an idea, but she kept <highlight>at</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这可能只是一个想法的开始，但她坚持了下来。

examination_example.sentence: Li Bai was very surprised <highlight>at</highlight> what the old woman was doing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 李白对老妇人的所作所为感到非常惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: Please call Jenny <highlight>at</highlight> 8124697 for more information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 请打电话8124697给珍妮了解更多信息。

examination_example.sentence: Before we have been <highlight>at</highlight> school, our name is written on the name list with a pen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们上学之前，我们的名字是用钢笔写在名单上的。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 泛指在一般的上午、下午和晚上；季节和某年、某月前也用in。
表示在具体某一天及具体某一天的上午、下午和晚上。
表示在某时刻，具体几点钟，也用在at noon, at night中。
